cards.question: Ruby was designed and developed by who and in what year?
What is $LOAD_PATH  used for in Ruby?
cards.hint: track the path to current place in file system
cards.answer: Make Ruby aware that included files must be searched in the current directory/

cards.question: Name a feature not found in Object Oriented Ruby
What is know as the "blueprint" by which a Ruby class is created
By which term are variabled defined in a Ruby method known?
cards.hint: they are local to that particular method and can't be accessed anywhere else
